name: Flora (itch) (Joeriri)
description:
Grow a garden to chill in with your cat.

Shelby wants a nice garden. Explore a tiny forest, sow seeds, water saplings and watch flowers bloom. Make your dream garden and spend some time with your cat.

Made for Milly for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2022

A game by Joeri Ridder

Art by IllyDinosaur, Koalaura and Joeri Ridder

Controls

Press ESC in the game to look at the controls!
